dcterms:description: A dataset for real-world semantic urban scene understanding, containing high-quality pixel-level annotations for 5,000 images and coarse annotations for 20,000 images collected from 50 different cities.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes

dcterms:creator: Mark Everingham
Luc Van Gool
Christopher KI Williams
John Winn
Andrew Zisserman
dcterms:description: A competition dataset for visual object classes, containing images collected from the flickr2 photo-sharing website, with 21 categories including 20 foreground classes and 1 background class.
dcterms:title: Pascal VOC

dcterms:creator: Gabriel J Brostow
Jamie Shotton
Julien Fauqueur
Roberto Cipolla
dcterms:description: A dataset established by Cambridge University for semantic segmentation, containing over 700 samples with pixel-level labels for 11 semantic classes.
dcterms:title: Camvid

dcterms:creator: Bolei Zhou
Hang Zhao
Xavier Puig
Tete Xiao
Sanja Fidler
Adela Barriuso
Antonio Torralba
dcterms:description: A popular semantic segmentation dataset with challenging scenes, containing around 25,000 images and 150 categories.
dcterms:title: ADE20K

dcterms:creator: Holger Caesar
Jasper Uijlings
Vittorio Ferrari
dcterms:description: A dataset augmented from MS COCO 2017 with pixel-level annotations, containing 172 classes and a total of 164K images.
dcterms:title: COCO-Stuff-164K
